projects.title: Porous Ceramic Bracelet
projects.description: A 3D–printed bracelet exploring negative‑space lattices in clay. It was fired at cone 6 and finished with a walnut‑shell burnish.

projects.title: Coffee‑Ground Composite Vase
projects.description: Up‑cycled coffee grounds mixed with a biodegradable resin to create a lightweight, earthy vessel.

name: Akio Tanaka
bio: Akio is a wood-shop specialist who blends traditional Japanese joinery with CNC milling to create flat-pack, tool-free furniture.

projects.title: Kumiko Light Panel
projects.description: A back-lit wall piece CNC-milled in cedar, using kumiko lattice patterns to cast intricate shadows.

projects.title: Slot-Together Stool
projects.description: A plywood stool that assembles without screws; each joint is press-fit and reinforced with rice-glue sizing.
